widgets.label: Fader 1
Fader 2
Fader 3
Cam 1
widgets.script:
var x = "objects/camera/cam 1.apx"

   set("cam_variable", 1),
   set("osc_cam_port", get("cam_1_port")),
   set("cam_1_xz", get("cam_1_xz_value")),
   set("cam_1_y", get("cam_1_y_value")),
   set("cam_1_pan", get("cam_1_pan_value")),
   set("cam_1_tilt", get("cam_1_tilt_value")),
   set("cam_1_roll", get("cam_1_roll_value")),
   set("cam_1_zoom", get("cam_1_zoom_value")),
   send(get("osc_indirection_tx"), "/d3/indirection/$", x)

widgets.label: Cam 2
widgets.script:
var x = "objects/camera/cam 2.apx"

   set("cam_variable", 2),
   set("osc_cam_port", get("cam_2_port")),
   set("cam_2_xz", get("cam_2_xz_value")),
   set("cam_2_y", get("cam_2_y_value")),
   set("cam_2_pan", get("cam_2_pan_value")),
   set("cam_2_tilt", get("cam_2_tilt_value")),
   set("cam_2_roll", get("cam_2_roll_value")),
   set("cam_2_zoom", get("cam_2_zoom_value")),
   send(get("osc_indirection_tx"), "/d3/indirection/$", x)

send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_x", value[0])
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_z", value[1])

widgets.label: ^caret-up
^caret-down
^caret-left
^caret-right
^undo-alt
^redo-alt
^search-plus
^search-minus

widgets.script:
var val = get("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_zoom"),
    low1 = get("zoom_min"),
    high1 = get("zoom_max"),
    low2 = 0,
    high2 = 100,
    outputValue = low2 + (high2 - low2) * (val - low1) / (high1 - low1),
    // zoom_val = Math.trunc(outputValue)
    zoom_val = outputValue.toFixed(2)
set("zoom_readout", zoom_val + " %")

send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k1", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k2", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k3", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_pa_width", 1)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_center_shift_x", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_center_shift_y", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_aspect_ratio", 1.77778)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_horizontal_fov", 1.5)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_sensor_size_x", 16)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_sensor_size_y", 9)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_focal_lenght", 1)
widgets.label: SEND Static Values - BROKEN
Cam 3
